name: Get to Red
description:
As the name already teases, the goal of the game is to get to the red plain. You can either make it in 10 seconds or 10 minutes, depending on your skill. There are no rules, ANYTHING IS ALLOWED. 

The project is focused on the progression of difficulty during the game. During the Level, the player faces 5 Situations, each a little harder than the one before. Situation 5 is supposed to be the hardest of the situations. Don't hesitate to give me some feedback on the difficulty.

Controls are Arrow keys & Space
